column1: '''Lairë''' is the [[Quenya]] name for the season of summer
column2: known in [[Sindarin]] as [[Laer]]. This was also the name of the second season in the [[Reckoning of Rivendell|Calendar of Imladris]]
column3: 72 days that fell more or less between [[1 June]] and [[9 August]] in the [[Shire Calendar]].<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>
